snippet: The insurer reported a better-than-expected 12.5 percent rise in quarterly profit, and it said it would expand its buyback program by $2 billion.
lead_paragraph: The insurer reported a better-than-expected 12.5 percent rise in quarterly profit, and it said it would expand its buyback program by $2 billion.

headline.main: A.I.G. Reports Rising Profit, Continuing Turnaround
headline.print_headline: A.I.G. Reports Rising Profit, Continuing Turnaround
